entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
